    • About Jonathan Carbutti


    Jonathan defines himself as an educator first, and real estate broker second. He enjoys educating the consumer, Buyers and Sellers alike, and dispelling many of the “myths” of buying and selling. As a successful real estate investor as well Jonathan is able to offer practical and useful advice whether you are the first-time investor or seasoned pro.
